articleContent.title: Arpeggio: add4 in D# (Shape: E)
articleContent.content:
# Arpeggio: add4 in D# (Shape: E)

## Introduction
This arpeggio is a D# add4 arpeggio played using the E shape on the guitar. It contains the notes D#, F#, A#, and G#.

## Notes and Intervals
- D# (Root)
- F# (Major 3rd)
- A# (Perfect 5th)
- G# (Major 4th)

The intervals in this arpeggio are Root, Major 3rd, Perfect 5th, and Major 4th.

## Genre and Musical Flavor
This arpeggio adds a sense of tension and color to music. It can be used in various genres, including rock, metal, jazz, and fusion. The Major 4th (G#) adds an interesting twist to the usual Major arpeggio sound.

## Songs
Three songs that feature the D# add4 arpeggio in the E shape:
1. "Stairway to Heaven" by Led Zeppelin
2. "Satch Boogie" by Joe Satriani
3. "Black Star" by Yngwie Malmsteen

These songs showcase the versatility and unique sound of this arpeggio shape.
